name: key-word-analyzer
description: 社媒文章一键解析器 - 支持小红书和微信公众号文章关键词提取

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:pages: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install
